# Methods

Let $y_{isn}$, where $Y \in \{0, 1\}$, denote the presence of species $s$ $(s = 1, \ldots, S)$ within nesting type $n$ $(N \in \{1, 3\})$ on atoll $i$ $(i = 1, \ldots, I)$ in region $r$ $(R \in \{1, 4\})$.

$$
\begin{split}
y_{isn} &\sim \text{Bern(p)} \\
\text{logit(p)} &= \alpha_{sr} + \beta_{nj} \times E_{ij} \\
\alpha_{sr} &\sim \mathcal{N}(0, 1) \\
\beta_{nj} &\sim \mathcal{N}(\bar{\beta}_{nj}, \sigma_{snj}) \\
\bar{\beta}_{nj} &\sim \mathcal{N}(0, 1) \\
\sigma_{nj} &\sim \text{Inv-Gamma}(3, 2)
\end{split}
$$
